title: Strategies for Building Instructor-Student Relationships in University Scientific Writing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific writing skills and digital learning platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Phenomenological approach needed to form meaningful relationships between instructors and students in a science writing course for pre-service teachers. Utilizing digital platforms in a BYOD environment while considering socioeconomic disparities

learning_goals: Students improve scientific writing competency by 30% through effective utilization of instructor feedback on digital platforms
Learners enhance self-efficacy in the writing process by 25% through regular 1:1 mentoring sessions with instructors
Students develop peer assessment and self-assessment skills with over 80% participation rates based on feedback rubrics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
